mapper.select: select 'theater' as w_contentType, t.t_id as w_id, t.t_title as w_title, t.t_poster as w_poster_url, t.t_genre as w_genre, t.t_start_date as w_start_date from theater_wish_tbl tw join theater_tbl t on tw.wt_t_id = t.t_id where tw.wt_u_id = #{u_seqno}
